EmailTemplate.name: Design Quiz & Strategy Brief
EmailTemplate.subject: Design Quiz
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Contact__c},
Please fill out this Design Quiz and this Strategy Form (Typeform) when you have a minute. This will give my team a jump start on being able to personalize your website rough draft.
If you already completed the form(s), please disregard this email.
All the best,
{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName}
